pull.title: lint: misc updates & fixes
pull.body:
Use newer versions of our lint packages.
Fix all the outstanding typos.
Fix the failing CI.

refactor: fixup named args in txpackage tests

Regression in #24152.

issue.title: doc: rewrite OpenBSD build docs for 7.0
issue.body:
Removes redundant notes for setting `CC` &`CXX` now that Clang is well and truly the base compiler. See: https://www.openbsd.org/70.html
> Disabled base-gcc on amd64.

Cleans up the wallet docs, i.e #23446.

Make the notes more similar to the FreeBSD notes.

issue.title: lint: Use newer versions of our lint packages, remove yq
issue.body:
- Update `codespell`, `flake8`, and `mypy` to latest versions
  - Ref: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/24796

- Remove unused `yq`
  - Ref: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22861/commits/fa050bbc0ad479063735b0325daa717ded404c8f
